root.title: Inscription Kultarhan
root.place: The inscription is carved on a rock in 40 km from Arhanan hill in Hishig-Ondor sum of Bulgan aimag of Mongolia.
root.store: The inscription is on its site.
root.description: The text is carved with a sharp needle on a long granite rock. There are 3 lines of old Turkic inscription.
root.size: The first line length is 107 cm, the second line length is 45 cm, the third line length is 35 cm. Height of symbols is 1.5-1.8 cm, depth is 0.1-0.2 cm.
root.investigation: O.Namnandorzh got pictures and hand written copies in 1966. The scientist of Language and literature institute of Mongolian Academy of Sciences H.Luvsanbaldan prepared paper copies of the inscription 195. Then E.Tryiarsky, S.G.Klyashtornyi, S.Karzhaubay conducted researches 196. Kazakh scientists conducted researches in 2001 and 2004.
root.details: Н.Базылхан "Көне түрік бітіктастары мен ескерткіштері (Орхон, Ениесей, Талас)" //"Қазақстан тарихы түркі тілді деректемелерде" атты сериясы бойынша. II том. - Алматы: Дайк-пресс, 2005. - Б.128
